entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
